headline: GTA Online
subtitle: This Week on the Podium: The Mammoth Squaddie
content: Visit The Diamond Casino & Resort to spin the Lucky Wheel and walk away with GTA$, RP, clothes, snacks, and all manner of mystery prizes. The top prize is the Mammoth Squaddie, an honest-to-goodness piece of military equipment deigned appropriate for civilian consumption. Crew cuts are optional but encouraged.
